Help keep this service alive!

I've had a really fun time creating this little web app, and I hope that it helps skydivers all of the world stay safe. Unfortunately it costs some money to keep this thing up and running. It relies on about 16 different weather services, geolocation services, and other programming APIs. It also costs money to host and serve the app. If you would like, you can help out by making a single donation of any amount that you choose, or setting up a subscription of $5 per month to keep the service alive.
